thread.title: Miss Hopkinson
thread.title_full: CORGI HomePlan reviewed by Miss Hopkinson

author: Miss Hopkinson
title: Miss Hopkinson
text:
I spoke to the Corgi service team as my boiler wasn't igniting properly and they said someone would come to fix within 24 hrs.
The next day an engineer came and temporarily fixed the boiler, and came back with a spare part and completely fixed the boiler the next morning.
Great service, and fine very promptly. The engineer was lovely as well.
